cards.title: Tiamat, The Mouth of the Inferno
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Mouth of the Inferno“ side up.
gameplay: {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is immune to fire damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {InfernoTiamatCharacter} dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} fire damage.
When {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is destroyed, she flips.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Fire“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt by heads by 1.
cards.challengeText: Whenever a villain Spell card enters play, if the head it names is decapitated, that head flips and is restored to {H * 3} HP.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Eye of the Storm
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Eye of the Storm“ side up.
gameplay: {StormTiamatCharacter} is immune to lightnining damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {StormTiamatCharacter} dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} lightning damage.
When {StormTiamatCharacter} is destroyed, she flips.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Lightning“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage taken by heads by 1.
cards.challengeText: Whenever a villain Spell card enters play, if the head it names is decapitated, that head flips and is restored to {H * 3} HP.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Jaws of Winter
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Jaws of Winter“ side up.
gameplay: {WinterTiamatCharacter} is immune to cold damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if {WinterTiamatCharacter} dealt no damage this turn, she deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} cold damage.
When {WinterTiamatCharacter} is destroyed, flip her.
flippedGameplay: When a spell card causes a head to deal damage, increase that damage by 1 for each “Element of Ice“ card in the villain trash
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage taken by heads by 1.
cards.challengeText: Whenever a villain Spell card enters play, if the head it names is decapitated, that head flips and is restored to {H * 3} HP.

cards.title: Acid Breath
body: Destroy 2 hero ongoing cards and 2 hero equipment cards.
The Head with the highest HP deals {H} toxic damage to each hero who did not destroy a card this way.

flavorQuotes.text: It cannot be. I saw the serpent{BR}buried in the sands of my time.

cards.title: Alteration
cards.body: Play the top card of the environment deck. Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Destruction and creation, the{BR}offspring of chaos.

cards.title: Ancient Ward
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to Heads by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: My misguided vision brought it{BR}back from the underworld, and it is{BR}now stronger than ever.

cards.title: Dragon's Wrath
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by Heads by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Summer and winter's{BR}war is spreading over all.

cards.flavorReference: The Lady of the Wood, Tiamat #95

cards.title: Elemental Form
cards.body: Whenever a Head takes damage, it becomes immune to damage of that type until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Elemental alignment{BR}protofunction suggests possible{BR}future upgrade paths.

cards.title: Elemental Frenzy
body: When this card enters play, shuffle all Spell cards from the villain trash and place them beneath this card face down.
At the end of the villain turn play the top card from this pile. When this pile is depleted, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Tiamat is the wrath of the ancient{BR}world, the chaos of the elements{BR}given terrible form.

cards.title: Element of Fire
body: If {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals each hero target 2+X fire damage, where X is the number of Element of Fire cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the most cards in play may not play cards until the start of the next villain turn.

cards.title: Element of Ice
body: If {WinterTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals each hero target 2+X cold damage, where X is the number of Element of Ice cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the highest HP may not use powers until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Cold and death have long been{BR}bedfellows.

cards.title: Element of Lightning
body: If {StormTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals each hero target 2+X lightning damage, where X is the number of Element of Lightning cards in the villain trash.
The hero with the most cards in hand may not draw cards until the start of the next villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: This storm was bred by an{BR}evil wind, and its master has no{BR}good intentions.

cards.title: Healing Magic
body: The Head with the lowest HP regains {H} + X HP, where X is the number of Healing Magic cards in the villain trash.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Quit changin' the cards and{BR}play the hand you were dealt!

cards.title: Mana Charge
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 3 Spell cards are revealed. Discard those cards. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck.
Shuffle all copies of Elemental Frenzy from the villain trash into the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: When things start glowing nothing{BR}good ever comes of it.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Book of the Dead #835

cards.title: Reptilian Aspect
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn each Head regains {H - 2} HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I practically severed one of its{BR}heads, and it grew back together!

cards.flavorReference: Quicksilver, Song of the Forbidden One-Shot

cards.title: Sky Breaker
cards.body: The Head with the highest HP deals each hero target {H + 2} infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: This world's end brought{BR}on by pieces of another.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Mouth of the Inferno
gameplay: {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is immune to fire damage.
cards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Eye of the Storm
gameplay: {StormTiamatCharacter} is immune to lightning damage.
cards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Maw of the Earth
gameplay: {Tiamat}, The Maw of the Earth is immune to melee damage.
Reduce damage dealt to other villain targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Breath of Decay
gameplay: {HydraDecayTiamatCharacter} is immune to toxic damage.
Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

cards.title: Tiamat, The Voice of the Wind
gameplay: {HydraWindTiamatCharacter} is immune to projectile damage.
At the end of the villain turn, each head regains 2 HP.
cards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

cards.title: Tiamat: Thunderous Gale Instructions
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Eye of the Storm” side up (after all other villain character cards enter play). Put “{HydraWindTiamatCharacter}”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if {StormTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, she flips and {HydraWindTiamatCharacter} enters play with 15 HP.
At the start of the villain turn, 1 decapitated head flips to its active side and is restored to {H * 2} HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {StormTiamatCharacter} deals each hero target 1 lightning damage.
cards.advanced: The first time {StormTiamatCharacter} deals damage each turn, increase that damage by 2.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, 1 decapitated head flips to its active side and is restored to {H * 2} HP.

Whenever Element of Lightning enters play and {StormTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, if {HydraWindTiamatCharacter} is active she deals the X hero targets with the Highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage each, where X = 1 plus the number of ongoing cards in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {StormTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 lightning damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to {H * 3} HP when they become active.

cards.title: Tiamat: Noxious Fire Instructions
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “Mouth of the Inferno” side up. Put “{HydraDecayTiamatCharacter}”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: The heroes may not win the game.
At the start of the villain turn, if {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, she flips and {HydraDecayTiamatCharacter} enters play with 15 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {InfernoTiamatCharacter} deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 fire damage.
cards.advanced: The first time {InfernoTiamatCharacter} deals damage each turn, increase that damage by 2.
flippedGameplay: The heroes win the game when 6 heads are decapitated.

Whenever Element of Fire enters play and {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, if {HydraDecayTiamatCharacter} is active she deals each hero target X toxic damage, where X = 2 plus the number of Acid Breaths in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {InfernoTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals the hero target with the second highest HP 1 fire damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to {H * 3} HP when they become active.

cards.title: Tiamat: Frigid Earth Instructions
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Jaws of Winter” side up. Put “{HydraEarthTiamatCharacter}”, face down beneath this card.
gameplay: Face down heads are indestructible and have no game text.
If a head would be destroyed, it flips instead.
At the start of the villain turn, if {WinterTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, she flips and {HydraEarthTiamatCharacter} enters play with 15 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, 1 player must discard 1 card.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, 1 player must discard 1 card.
flippedGameplay: Face down heads are indestructible and have no game text.
If a head would be destroyed, it flips instead.

Whenever Element of Ice enters play and {WinterTiamatCharacter} is decapitated, if {HydraEarthTiamatCharacter} is active she deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X = {H} plus the number of Sky Breaker cards in the villain trash.
At the end of the villain turn, if {WinterTiamatCharacter} is active, she deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 cold damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Decapitated heads are restored to {H * 3} HP when they become active.

cards.title: Exoscale
body: When this card is destroyed, 1{BR}hero may draw a card or use a{BR}power. Then, this card flips.
cards.flippedBody: This card is indestructible and{BR}cannot leave the villain play area.

cards.title: Neoscale
body: When this card is destroyed, 1{BR}hero may draw a card or play a{BR}card. Then, this card flips.
cards.flippedBody: This card is indestructible and{BR}cannot leave the villain play area.

promoCards.title: Tiamat, The Jaws of Winter
gameplay: {WinterTiamatCharacter} is immune to cold damage.
promoCards.challengeText: Villain ongoings are indestructible as long as 2 or more heads are not decapitated.

promoCards.title: Tiamat
setup: At the start of the game, {Tiamat} enters play “The Arrival“ side up. Both Dragonscale character cards enter play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Dragonscales have X HP, where X = {H - 1}.
At the start of the villain turn, {Tiamat} flips.
promoCards.advanced: X = {H + 1} instead.{BR}At the start of the game, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 2 spells are revealed. Discard those spells. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
flippedGameplay: Dragonscales have X HP where X = {H - 1}. When {Tiamat} is destroyed, the heroes win.
{Tiamat} counts as The Jaws of Winter, The Mouth of the Inferno, and The Eye of the Storm. Each spell card in the villain trash counts as Element of Ice, Element of Fire, and Element of Lightining.

At the end of the villain turn, {Tiamat} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} energy damage. Then, if {Tiamat} deals no damage this turn, each hero target deals itself 3 projectile damage. Then all ruined scales flip and are restored to their max HP.
promoCards.challengeText: Whenever a non-villain target deals damage to a Dragonscale, {Tiamat} deals that target {H - 1} projectile damage.
